    • produce

      public boolean produce​(Player p) throws NotEnoughResource, AlreadyUsed
      Player select A production card trough the view and this model method will be called to activate THIS FUNCTION DOSNT REMOVE COST RESOURCE (it will be done by controller)
      Parameters:
      p - Dashboard of the player
      Returns:
      true if the activation goes well
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResource
      AlreadyUsed
